description: Perhaps a remnant from the primordial age, the Matriarch could induce the growth of protective metal plating on Gohma large enough to carry such heavy armor.
tooltip: Perhaps a remnant from the primordial age, the Matriarch could induce the growth of protective metal plating on Gohma large enough to carry such heavy armor. (Tank Gohma and Armogohmas grow an extra layer of armor, giving them +25% non-magic armor. They also now spawn Royal Larva on death.)
